set.name: CLB~
set.longname: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

card.name: Assembled Ensemble
card.text: VigilanceAssembled Ensemble's power is equal to the number of Robots you control.Whenever you cast a spell with an artifact creature in its art, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token.

card.name: Blood Crypt
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Killer Cosplay
card.text: Whenever Killer Cosplay becomes attached to a creature, choose a creature card name with an identical mana cost. That creature becomes a copy of the card with the chosen name until Killer Cosplay becomes unattached from it.Equip {3}

card.name: Saw in Half
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, its controller creates two tokens that are copies of that creature, except their base power is half that creature's power and their base toughness is half that creature's toughness. Round up each time.

card.name: The Space Family Goblinson
card.text: The Space Family Goblinson has trample as long as you've rolled three or more dice this turn.Whenever you roll a die, put a +1/+1 counter on The Space Family Goblinson.

card.name: The Space Family Goblinson
card.text: The Space Family Goblinson has trample as long as you've rolled three or more dice this turn.Whenever you roll a die, put a +1/+1 counter on The Space Family Goblinson.

card.name: Water Gun Balloon Game
card.text: As Water Gun Balloon Game enters the battlefield, each player puts a pop! counter on "0."Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop! counter up one.Whenever a player's pop! counter hits "5," that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop! counters to "0."

card.name: Watery Grave
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Ancient Brass Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Ancient Brass Dragon deals combat damage to a player, roll a d20. When you do, put any number of target creature cards with mana value X or less from graveyards onto the battlefield under your control, where X is the result.

card.text: Bountiful Promenade enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents.{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Elder Brain
card.text: MenaceWhenever Elder Brain attacks a player, exile all cards from that player's hand, then they draw that many cards. You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

You may play lands and cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

card.name: Fireball
card.text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

card.name: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
card.text: When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.

card.name: Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes
card.text: When Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may create Boo, a legendary 1/1 red Hamster creature token with trample and haste.+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature with trample or haste.−2: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes deals X damage to any target, where X is that creature's power. If the sacrificed creature was a Hamster, draw X cards.Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes can be your commander.

card.name: Wand of Wonder
card.text: {4}, {T}: Roll a d20. Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card, then shuffles the rest into their library. You may cast up to X instant and/or sorcery spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.1-9 | X is one10-19 | X is two.20 | X is three.
